<h3 id="X30424">X(30424) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd EHRMANN AND KOSNITA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^3+(b+c)*a^2-2*(b-c)^2*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30424) = X(1)-3*X(7) = 5*X(1)-3*X(390) = X(1)+3*X(4312) = 2*X(1)-3*X(5542) = 11*X(1)-9*X(8236) = 7*X(1)-9*X(11038) = 4*X(1)-3*X(30331) = 3*X(1)-X(30332) = 3*X(1)-5*X(30340) = 5*X(7)-X(390) = 11*X(7)-3*X(8236) = 7*X(7)-3*X(11038) = 4*X(7)-X(30331) = 9*X(7)-X(30332) = 9*X(7)-5*X(30340) = 3*X(9)-4*X(3634) = 3*X(10)-2*X(5220) = X(390)+5*X(4312) = 2*X(390)-5*X(5542) = 11*X(390)-15*X(8236) = X(5220)-3*X(5880)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(575). X(30424) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30424) lies on these lines:
{1,7}, {9,3634}, {10,527}, {11,4031}, {12,11662}, {35,30295}, {36,8543}, {46,3947}, {55,3982}, {57,1776}, {65,2801}, {79,1156}, {142,3647}, {144,9780}, {226,1155}, {354,4114}, {382,17706}, {515,1159}, {518,3625}, {528,3244}, {551,5126}, {553,1836}, {673,16477}, {758,5784}, {938,5586}, {942,15726}, {946,20418}, {954,5217}, {971,5884}, {1001,5267}, {1056,28228}, {1088,10136}, {1125,5698}, {1698,6172}, {1699,21454}, {1743,7613}, {2094,5231}, {2550,3626}, {3008,24695}, {3062,5556}, {3339,9814}, {3474,4654}, {3487,12512}, {3488,28158}, {3579,5762}, {3617,5223}, {3755,17365}, {3826,10592}, {3868,5696}, {3874,15733}, {3883,7321}, {3923,21255}, {3935,17483}, {3950,28526}, {4052,29649}, {4078,17767}, {4652,5550}, {4663,5845}, {4847,20292}, {4851,28557}, {5221,5729}, {5435,10171}, {5493,21620}, {5551,10390}, {5572,13369}, {5708,5805}, {5728,17637}, {5819,16670}, {5843,18357}, {5851,12019}, {5852,24393}, {5902,10394}, {5905,21060}, {6006,21201}, {6147,8255}, {6738,9579}, {6767,28232}, {7263,28570}, {7671,18398}, {7741,30311}, {7951,30312}, {9612,12848}, {9812,10980}, {11009,14151}, {11529,28164}, {12047,30379}, {12609,15823}, {12699,21625}, {12702,12872}, {14100,15009}, {14563,28160}, {15803,30275}, {15934,28150}, {15935,28154}, {16125,18482}, {17274,19868}, {17298,24280}, {17376,28530}, {18230,19872}, {18421,28236}, {20103,28609}, {20533,29601}, {21635,24465}, {25415,30318}, {30287,30290}, {30359,30362}, {30367,30370}, {30404,30408}, {30405,30420}</p>
<p>
X(30424) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {7, 4312}, {3868, 5696}, {5223, 20059}<br>
X(30424) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 5880), (5542, 7), (5698, 1125), (14100, 20116), (30331, 5542)<br>
X(30424) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (7, 30332, 30340), (4307, 4862, 4353), (30332, 30340, 1)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
